Articles.Content: Hi guys, i see that there's no megathread for Novapunch, so i made one. Post any Novapunch crafts here! comments welcome, craft file preferred and pictures are preferred.

So, my ships (no pics yet , will upload later) are the deep space series. Launcher: The pegasus 1, can launch the thor package to eeloo. The thor i am talking about here is another of the series, which i modified from the original one.
Looking forward to seeing what you guys have come up with
